package.name: Horde_Crypt
package.description: A library that provides wrappers for various cryptographic systems.

release.notes: * Initial release as a PEAR package
* Converted to package.xml 2.0 for pear.horde.org * Added support for email addresses in subjectAltName of S/MIME certs (Bug #5986) * Improved support for PGP fingerprints (Bug #6363)
* First alpha release for Horde 4. * Add Horde_Crypt_Exception. * Better error handling for gnupg and openssl command line binaries.
* First beta release for Horde 4.
* First release candidate for Horde 4.
* Second release candidate for Horde 4.
* First stable release for Horde 4.
* [jan] Fix package.xml syntax.
* [jan] Updated Spanish translation.
* [jan] Updated Slovak translation.

* [jan] Update Latvian translation. * [jan] Allow to specify body charset when verifying PGP signed messages. * [jan] Update Lithuanian translation. * [jan] Update Brazilian Portuguese translation. * [mms] Use strongest cipher possible when encrypting S/MIME data (Request #10246).
* [mms] Encrypted data is already base64 encoded (Bug #10285).
* [jan] Update Croatian translation. * [jan] Update Estonian translation. * [mms] Upgrade signed S/MIME output to comply with S/MIME version 3.2.

* [mms] Provide signature information when decrypting a message, rather than just a boolean result. * [mms] Fix displaying PGP key expiration information. * [mms] Allow expiration date to be given to Horde_Crypt_Pgp#generateKey() (Request #5754).
* [mms] Improved parsing of S/MIME certificate information (Bug #10956). * [mms] Silently ignore unknown data when parsing S/MIME certificates.
* [jan] Fix HTML rendering of S/MIME certificates with multi-value attributes.
* [jan] Throw exception if parsing of S/MIME certificates fails (Bug #11530). * [mms] Improvements in obtaining GPG keys from a keyserver (Bug #11380) (o+horde@immerda.ch).
* First alpha release for Horde 5.
* First beta release for Horde 5.
* [mms] Improvements in obtaining GPG keys from a keyserver (Bug #11380) (o+horde@immerda.ch).
* [jan] Throw exception if parsing of S/MIME certificates fails (Bug #11530).
* First stable release for Horde 5.
* [jan] Update Dutch translation (Arjen de Korte <build+horde@de-korte.org>). * [mms] Add Horde_Crypt_Pgp#getPublicKeyFromPrivateKey().
* [jan] Update Basque translation (Ibon Igartua <ibon.igartua@ehu.es>).
* [jan] Update French translation (Paul De Vlieger <paul.de_vlieger@moniut.univ-bpclermont.fr>).
* [jan] Change default keyserver to pool.sks-keyservers.net. * [jan] Fix finding key ID for an email address on a keyserver (o@immerda.ch).
* [mms] Fix Horde_Crypt_Pgp#encryptedSymmetrically() from entering an infinite loop when using GnuPg v2. * [mms] Improve security in PGP key generation (Request #12099).
* [mms] SECURITY: Fix XSS vulnerability in Horde_Crypt_Smime#certToHTML() (João Machado <geral@jpaulo.eu>).
* [jan] Fix detecting bad PGP signatures on some systems with non-English locales (Bug #10273).
* [mms] Horde_Crypt_Pgp#parsePGPData() now accepts a Horde_Stream object as an argument.

* [mms] Remove Horde_Crypt_Pgp#generateRevocation() (Bug #7375). * [mms] Fix submitting PGP keys to a public keyserver (Bug #10931). * [mms] PGP keyserver code now uses Horde_Http_Client to connect to the keyserver. * [mms] Move PGP keyserver code to a separate Horde_Crypt_Pgp_Keyserver class. * [mms] Add Horde_Crypt_Pgp_Parse#parseToPart(). * [mms] Move Horde_Crypt_Pgp#parsePGPData() to separate class (Horde_Crypt_Pgp_Parse), since it can be used even if GnuPG binary is not available.
* [mms] Ensure that all text parts are Q-P encoded when signing a MIME part. * [mms] More efficient parsing in Horde_Crypt_Pgp_Parse.
* [jan] Update Korean translation (Deokgon Kim <dgkim@dgkim.net>).
* [jan] Update Hungarian translation (Andras Galos <galosa@netinform.hu>).
* [mms] Fix reference to constant outside of the package.
* [jan] Fix using non-deprecated Content-Type for encrypted messages (Bug #13659).
* [mms] Fix parsing GPG packet information using the gnupg v2.1 binary.
* [jan] Make all PGP features locale-independent.

* [jan] Updated UK translation. * [jan] Fix issues with certain locales like Turkish. * [mms] Split gnupg command-line binary specific code out into a separate PGP backend driver. * [mms] S/MIME encryption is now done only with AES (if using PHP 5.4+) or 3DES.
* [mjr] Fix PHP 5.3 incompatibility (Bug #14090).

* [jan] Add Horde_Crypt_Pgp::pgpPacketInformationMultiple() and Horde_Crypt_Pgp_Backend_Binary::packetInfoMultiple() (Request #13190). * [jan] Fix retrieving PGP keys from the keyserver with certain HTTP client backends. * [jan] Fix creating PGP keys with comments (Bug #14125). * [jan] Mark PHP 7 as supported.
* [jan] Update Greek translation (Limperis Antonis <limperis@cti.gr>). * [jan] Try three times to retrieve public PGP if the keyserver pool contains broken servers.
* [jan] Fix throwing exception if verifying a PGP signature failed.
* [jan] Work around broken PGP key servers.
* [mjr] Ensure version information is output in ASCII armored output. * [jan] Fix parsing inline signed PGP messages with PHP 7+ (Bug #14352).
* [jan] Fix label for S/MIME Encrypted Key Usage attribute.
* [mjr] SECURITY: Fix remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2017-7413, and CVE-2017-7414).
* [mjr] Correctly specify either sha-1 or sha-256 when signing a smime message. * [jan] Support GnuPG 2.1+ too (Bug #14014).
* [jan] Detect unsupported GnuPG versions. * [jan] Fix detection of new GnuPG API (Remi Collet <remi@remirepo.net>, PR #220).
* [jan] More fixes for GnuPG 2 (Mathieu Parent <math.parent@gmail.com>). * [jan] Remove dependency on openssl executable (Hadi Nategh <hnategh@gmail.com>).
* [jan] Correctly determine expiration dates of short living PGP keys.
* [jan] Improve S/MIME key details formatting.
* [mjr] Fix detecting digest algo properly (Bug #14814).
* [jan] Enforce MDC verification when decrypting PGP messages to mitigate EFAIL attacks (Immerda <admin@immerda.ch>). * |+
* [rla] Alpha Release for PHP 8. * |+
